sentences.english: But consumption, for people of faith, is a double-edged sword.
sentences.chinese: 但对自由市场的信仰者而言，消费是把双刃剑。

sentences.english: I make bold to say that violence is the creed of no religion....
sentences.chinese: 我可以大胆的说暴力是无信仰者的信条。

sentences.english: I'm tired of people calling me a devil worshiper .
sentences.chinese: 我厌倦了别人叫我一个魔鬼信仰者。

sentences.english: The idea of Pure Land has been a basic purpose for Chinese Buddhists in the past two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 净土思想是两千年来中国佛教信仰者的基本旨趣。

sentences.english: But natural disasters and catastrophic illnesses really test the believers' faith.
sentences.chinese: 但是自然灾害和灾难性疾病能真正考验信仰者的信仰。

sentences.english: Believers know that all things are under Allah's control.
sentences.chinese: 信仰者们知道一切事情全归安拉掌管。

sentences.english: In the hands of believers as a guarantee to defeat the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 是信仰者手中克敌制胜的保证。

sentences.english: Unitarians may not wish to read any further.
sentences.chinese: 自由信仰者看到这里可能不想再读下去了。

sentences.english: He says the Cod Academy made him a believer in fish farming.
sentences.chinese: 他说，鳕鱼学院让他成为水产养殖的信仰者。
狂热的宗教信仰者鞭打自己。

definition: to believe firmly/devout in one's faith
